info

Hi! i'm Desteny (b. 2000, Puerto Rico), you can also call me des (he/she) ^_^

I'm a Web Development and Web Design enthusiast studying Computer Science @ University of Puerto Rico, Río Piedras.

Board member and active participant of Asociación Estudiantil de Ciencias de Cómputos - AECC*

I've always loved creating things. Making hand-coded websites with HTML/CSS/JS is my latest obsession. and i love it very much ヾ(＠⌒ー⌒＠)ノ
i am currently learning frameworks such as React.

Currently available for any interships or work! Anything related to web development is preferrable. My email is open for any questions!

publications

(2024) Maren Bell, Hello, World (Wide Web)!
